title: My game is not working
body: Whenever I try to start a game, I'll get to champion select and after the game goes to the loading screen, my screen turns black and nothing happens. I have tried uninstalling and reinstalling a couple times. I'm not sure if it's just this new patch or what. Cause I also recently downloaded the newest Mac OS before I started playing. Any thoughts or suggestions as what I should do?

replies.body: I did the Window 10 update and now everytimes I log into a game, my pc crash. I have to wait that my pc have no longer power.

Try disabling the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) as a first step.  If you still have any issues after, let me know with some more details of any errors or what you're seeing!
I'm having a similar problem. As soon as I load at the shop, my whole computer crashes, and I have to shut down.

Are you on PC and did you recently update windows 10?  A recent change to the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) has been causing the game to crash for some players.  Disabling it should get this resolved!

The black screen issue at the loading screen is usually due to a network issue failing to establish a connection to the game server.  Going over the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide can get this fixed up.  Make sure to select the Mac box for instructions specific to your OS.  Let me know if you have any questions!
